screenshots.caption: Screenshot of Gemi PCR oligos/primers design tool

name: Gemi
short_description:
Gemi is fast, automated and user-friendly tool to design primers and probes for polymerase chain reaction (PCR). 
Gemi accepts multiple aligned and long DNA and RNA sequences with degenerate nucleotide (non-A/C/G/T bases). 
It can be used for quantitative/real-time PCR, conventional and Sanger sequencing (qPCR, rt-PCR, etc.). 

* Note 1: In version 1.2, Td is calculated, but in version 1.3, the Tm and salt adjustment are considered.
* Note 2: If no oligo was reported, The search options/parameters should be changed as described in manual.
 
Article: PMID: 23316117, PMCID: PMC3535827 

Source codes (C#, C++ and Python codes) will be available upon request.
summary: PCR primers / probes design from multiple & degenerate sequences
